item.title: High Court judges call for organized effort to eradicate devadasi practice
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: Eradicating the regressive devadasi practice can only be achieved through a “concerted and organized effort,” stated Chief Justice of the High Court and Principal Patron of the State Legal Services Authority, Vibhuh Bakru, while addressing a massive health camp and legal literacy program organized at Pandit Siddarama Jambaladinni Rangamandira in Raichur on Saturday. The event was held under the aegis of the State Legal Services Authority, Raichur District Legal Services Authority, distr...]]>
item.author: The Hans India, Live Updates, Big Story
